articles.title: Anfernee Simons catches fire, leads Celtics to trap game win over Bulls: 7 takeaways
articles.description:
The Celtics are now second in the Eastern Conference following their 115-101 win over the Bulls.

The post Anfernee Simons catches fire, leads Celtics to trap game win over Bulls: 7 takeaways appeared first on Boston.com.
